item.title: ‚òÄÔ∏è Save 49% on the viral TruSkin Vitamin C Serum with 150,000 reviews
item.description: Of all the beauty products in my skincare cabinet, few have been more effective than theTruSkin Vitamin C Serum‚Äîand I'm far from alone in my testimony. Known as one of Amazon's best-selling products, with an average 4.3 rating and over 150,000 reviews (casual), this small but mighty formula is packed with a bevy of nourishing ingredients likehyaluronic acidand vitamins E and C, all of which work in conjunction to create what is (IMO) a miracle serum.
